body: How many platforms (iOS, Android, Mobile Web)?
Will your app need photo library access?
Will your app need GPS access?
Will your app integrate a legacy system?
What level of security will your app have?
Will your app support credit card payment?
Will your app integrate SalesForce CRM?
How many ways will users be able to sign in (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Google)?
Will your app support an MVP or polished design?
